data.text: Mwana wanga, usayiwale malangizo anga,
Ukatero zaka za moyo wako zidzachuluka
Makhalidwe ochitira ena chifundo ndi owonetsa kukhulupirika asakuchokere.
Ukatero udzapeza kuyanja ndi mbiri yabwino
Uzikhulupirira Yehova ndi mtima wako wonse
Pa zochita zako zonse uvomereze kuti Mulungu alipo,
Usamadzione ngati wa nzeru.
Ukatero thupi lako lidzakhala la moyo wabwino
Uzilemekeza Yehova ndi chuma chako chonse;
Ukatero nkhokwe zako zidzadzaza ndi zinthu zambiri,
Mwana wanga usanyoze malangizo a Yehova,
Paja Yehova amadzudzula amene amamukonda,
Wodala munthu amene wapeza nzeru,
pakuti phindu la nzeru ndi labwino kuposa la siliva,
Nzeru ndi yoposa miyala yamtengowapatali;
Mʼdzanja lake lamanja muli moyo wautali;
Njira zake ndi njira zosangalatsa,
Nzeru ili ngati mtengo wopatsa moyo kwa oyigwiritsitsa;
Yehova anakhazikitsa dziko lapansi pogwiritsa ntchito nzeru.
Mwa nzeru zake Yehova anatumphutsa madzi kuchokera mʼnthaka
Mwana wanga usunge nzeru yeniyeni ndi khalidwe lomalingarira zinthu bwino.
Zimenezi zidzakupatsa moyo,
Choncho udzayenda pa njira yako mosaopa kanthu,
pamene ugona pansi, sudzachita mantha;
Usaope tsoka lobwera mwadzidzidzi
pakuti Yehova adzakulimbitsa mtima
Usaleke kuchitira zabwino amene ayenera kulandira zabwino,
Usanene kwa mnansi wako kuti,
Usamukonzere chiwembu mnansi wako,
Usakangane ndi munthu wopanda chifukwa
Usachite naye nsanje munthu wachiwawa
Pakuti Yehova amanyansidwa ndi munthu woyipa
Yehova amatemberera nyumba ya munthu woyipa,
Anthu onyoza, Iye amawanyoza,
Anthu anzeru adzalandira ulemu,
